TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it is at the bottom of the Grand Canyon.

I wish I had some Doritos 

Edited June 9, 2021 by Admiral Fluffy
Hy llok nw pg

Granted. They are in the jello at the bottom of the Grand Canyon.

I wish the jello was lime flavoured.

granted, it cost 500.000.000.000$

i wish trucks can load saturn v

(Yay, I am in sandbox mode, money is not a problem   )

Granted. They can load saturn 5 but they can't go anywhere because their suspension and tyres can't take the weight.

I wish I could combine the best bits of Minecraft and KSP into an awesome computer game.

granted, but the graphic was so cool and ur comp can't handle it. it crashes.

i wish this is not corruptod

Granted, but because "corrupted" was not spelled correctly your computer thought the command was 0 divided by 0, created a black hole, and ended the universe. The only remnants of the entire universe was a Kenworth T880 dump truck filled with lime flavored Dorito Jello.

I wish for someone to spectacularly corrupt this wish.

Granted.
The universe has now been restored, and Atoms are replaced by Dorito flavored lime dump truck jello.

I wish that I could have a nice pet alligator

Granted. it bites you and you go to the hospital. You live, and you have no permanent damage besides a scar, but it hurt like hell!

I wish for a pallet of printer paper.

Granted, but the printer paper is turned into paint colors.

I wish I could go to the Mun in real life

Granted. You forgot your spacesuit.

I wish for Bagger 288.

granted, you got a bag-making machine

i wish i have 100 Pizza Slice's

Sure, you get them in 1:100 scale. Enjoy them! They are only 0.07 inches long, so they all fit in a convenient travel size snack bag!

I wish for the characters of Futurama to come to life.

but they die when they escape the TV

i wihs thsi wlil nto eb curropteed

INVALID COMMAND

DISK READ ERROR

HUMAN TERMINATION SOFTWARE ERROR

universe1.exe HAS  STOPPED RESPONDING.

Would you like to restart program "universe1.exe"? Y/N

LOADING...................

RESTART FROM BIG BANG OR FROM LAST SAVED POSITION?

Are you sure?

Are you sure?

Last chance to decline command.

RESTARTING UNIVERSE1  in    5....4....3...2...1...B̴̢̢̨̡͚̯̭̞͖̥̖̭̘̺̗͇̲̝̱̫̦͔͙̟̞̳͓̫̗͚̤͎̤̳̺̘͈͕̥̳̟̱̖̭̉̂͛̅̊́̐̌̐͊́̋̔̾̀̀͋́̑̇̾̑͊̈́̑͐͑́̋̐̽͐̈̍̀͐̈͑̒̀̃̓̈́̍̄̏̆̚̚̕͘̚͠͠͝͝͝͝͝ͅͅÒ̵̧̨̢̨̨̹̳̥͇͇͍͙̪̦͇̰͈̟̖̰̫̫̝̗̞̤͈̭͕͈O̸̡̰̦̪̼̩̩̹͕͎̘͙͈͎̯̠͚̥̠͇͚͇̭̪̥̩̝͚̻͒͌̿̉̔̇̅͗̉͌̍̋͠͝ͅM̷͎͓̲̮̘͕̩͚̙͉̖̅͑̐̎͗̾́̈́͠

 

 

 

I wish for a 1TB SSD.

granted, but when u receive it, the disk is only 1kb

i wish for an ol' computer tht i cld turn on

Ok, here's ENIAC. 

I want a big powerful magnet.

okay, you got it, bc it was very big, the same as jupiter, it pulled all planet to it.

i wish fur a fur

Granted. You get a single strand of dog fur.

I wish for a computer more capable than this 2017 Ideapad 320

Ok, you get an IdiotPad 320.

Hey, I am on an Ideapad 3. Soon switching over to a Dell Latitude.

I wish for a German-English dictionary.

It's from the 12th century.

I wish for an acceptable, edible, ordinary lunch

Ok, but it's something that I thought edible, and maybe you won't.

I wish for a German-English dictionary that was made recently.

Granted. But due to advances in modern miniturisation you need an Electron Microscope to read it.

I wish for a tough waterproof phone where the rubber doesn't suddenly expand and pop off 2 years after you bought it.

Granted. You have a phone in a strong pressurized steel box. Now you can gurgle in it.

I wish to know why those signature pictures are duplicated are duplicated.

Edited June 10, 2021 by kerbiloid

Granted. You realise that they are each different if you look carefully and that you now are suffering from double vision.

I wish to base jump from a weather ballon 25,000 meters up on Kerbin. With a fully functioning parachute, suit, helmet and all other gear required.

Granted. You are floating in the middle of the ocean on a planet with no winds and no flows.

I wish you have a try with the new @Angel-125's scuba mod.
